publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5485 Anne McLaughlin: Pakistan International Airlines—That the Parliament celebrates the news that Pakistan International Airlines will maintain the regular route between Lahore, Pakistan, and Glasgow; recognises that this route is a crucial support to the many economic, cultural and familial links between Scotland and Pakistan, and further recognises that local authorities, the Pakistani community in Scotland and the Government of Pakistan will work together to raise the profile of Pakistan International Airlines in order to ensure the continued sustainability of the route.
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Hugh Henry*
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-5485 Pakistan International Airlines (lodged on 8 January 2010) Stuart McMillan*
